name: Dark cmake.org
description: A simple dark theme for CMake website, by a CSS noob
additional_info:
• 1.0.3: more readable string and number literals in code sections
  • 1.0.2: dark contents section
  • 1.0.1: apply URL regex https?://cmake.org/cmake/help.* instead of https?://cmake.org/(?!pipermail).* to avoid collisions with official site
